summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5837 for the improvement of 28th Avenue South, from Graham Street to Raymond Street on the west; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76995, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
